001package com.github.tommyettinger.colorful.ycwcm;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.Gdx;
004import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color;
005import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.GL20;
006import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Mesh;
007import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture;
008import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.VertexAttribute;
009import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.VertexAttributes;
010import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch;
011import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion;
012import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShaderProgram;
013import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Affine2;
014import com.badlogic.gdx.math.MathUtils;
015import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4;
016import com.badlogic.gdx.utils.NumberUtils;
017import com.github.tommyettinger.colorful.FloatColors;
018
019import java.nio.Buffer;
020
021/**
022 * A substitute for {@link com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch} that adds an additional attribute to store an
023 * extra color's worth of channels, used to modify the luma and chromatic channels of a color by multiplication (called
024 * the "tweak") while the primary color affects the color additively (just called the color, often drawn from
025 * {@link Palette} or generated with {@link FloatColors}).
026 * <br>
027 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 12/14/2019.
028 */
029public class ColorfulBatch implements Batch {
030    public static final int SPRITE_SIZE = 24;
031    public static final String TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE = "a_tweak";
032
033    private Mesh mesh;
034
035    private final float[] vertices;
036    private int idx = 0;
037    private Texture lastTexture = null;
038    private float invTexWidth = 0, invTexHeight = 0;
039
040    private boolean drawing = false;
041
042    private final Matrix4 transformMatrix = new Matrix4();
043    private final Matrix4 projectionMatrix = new Matrix4();
044    private final Matrix4 combinedMatrix = new Matrix4();
045
046    private boolean blendingDisabled = false;
047    private int blendSrcFunc = GL20.GL_SRC_ALPHA;
048    private int blendDstFunc = GL20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA;
049    private int blendSrcFuncAlpha = GL20.GL_SRC_ALPHA;
050    private int blendDstFuncAlpha = GL20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA;
051
052    private final ShaderProgram shader;
053    private ShaderProgram customShader = null;
054    private boolean ownsShader;
055
056    protected float color = Palette.GRAY;
057    private final Color tempColor = new Color(0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1f);
058
059    /**
060     * A constant packed float that can be assigned to this ColorfulBatch's tweak with {@link #setTweak(float)} to make
061     * all of the tweak adjustments virtually imperceptible. When this is set as the tweak, it won't change the luma
062     * multiplier or luma contrast, and it won't change either chromatic value multiplier.
063     */
064    public static final float TWEAK_RESET = ColorTools.ycwcm(0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f);
065    protected float tweak = TWEAK_RESET;
066
067    /** Number of render calls since the last {@link #begin()}. **/
068    public int renderCalls = 0;
069
070    /** Number of rendering calls, ever. Will not be reset unless set manually. **/
071    public int totalRenderCalls = 0;
072
073    /** The maximum number of sprites rendered in one batch so far. **/
074    public int maxSpritesInBatch = 0;
075
076    /** Constructs a new ColorfulBatch with a size of 1000, one buffer, and the default shader.
077     * @see #ColorfulBatch(int, ShaderProgram) */
078    public ColorfulBatch() {
079        this(1000, null);
080    }
081
082    /** Constructs a ColorfulBatch with one buffer and the default shader.
083     * @see #ColorfulBatch(int, ShaderProgram)  */
084    public ColorfulBatch(int size) {
085        this(size, null);
086    }
087
088    /** Constructs a new ColorfulBatch. Sets the projection matrix to an orthographic projection with y-axis point upwards, x-axis
089     * point to the right and the origin being in the bottom left corner of the screen. The projection will be pixel perfect with
090     * respect to the current screen resolution.
091     * <p>
092     * The defaultShader specifies the shader to use. Note that the names for uniforms for this default shader are different than
093     * the ones expect for shaders set with {@link #setShader(ShaderProgram)}. See {@link #createDefaultShader()}.
094     * @param size The max number of sprites in a single batch. Max of 10922.
095     * @param defaultShader The default shader to use. This is not owned by the ColorfulBatch and must be disposed separately. */
096    public ColorfulBatch(int size, ShaderProgram defaultShader) {
097        // 65535 is max vertex index, so 65535 / 6 vertices per sprite = 10922 sprites max.
098        if (size > 10922) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Can't have more than 10922 sprites per batch: " + size);
099
100        Mesh.VertexDataType vertexDataType = (Gdx.gl30 != null) ? Mesh.VertexDataType.VertexBufferObjectWithVAO : Mesh.VertexDataType.VertexArray;
101
102        mesh = new Mesh(vertexDataType, false, size * 4, size * 6,
103                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.Position, 2, ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE),
104                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.ColorPacked, 4, ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE),
105                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.TextureCoordinates, 2, ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0"),
106                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.ColorPacked, 4, TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE));
107
108        projectionMatrix.setToOrtho2D(0, 0, Gdx.graphics.getWidth(), Gdx.graphics.getHeight());
109
110        vertices = new float[size * SPRITE_SIZE];
111
112        int len = size * 6;
113        short[] indices = new short[len];
114        short j = 0;
115        for (int i = 0; i < len; i += 6, j += 4) {
116            indices[i] = j;
117            indices[i + 1] = (short)(j + 1);
118            indices[i + 2] = (short)(j + 2);
119            indices[i + 3] = (short)(j + 2);
120            indices[i + 4] = (short)(j + 3);
121            indices[i + 5] = j;
122        }
123        mesh.setIndices(indices);
124
125        if (defaultShader == null) {
126            shader = createDefaultShader();
127            ownsShader = true;
128        } else
129            shader = defaultShader;
130    }
131
132    /**
133     * Makes a new instance of the default ShaderProgram used for this ColorfulBatch, without any {@code #version}
134     * specified in the shader source. This expects an extra attribute (relative to a normal SpriteBatch) that is used
135     * for the tweak. You may want to set the code to prepend before you call this, as with:
136     * {@code ShaderProgram.prependVertexCode = "#version 110\n";
137     * ShaderProgram.prependFragmentCode = "#version 110\n";}
138     * The actual version can be different, and may need to be different for compatibility with some hardware.
139     * @return a new instance of the default shader used by ColorfulBatch for GL2 when no shader is specified
140     */
141    public static ShaderProgram createDefaultShader () {
142        String vertexShader = "attribute vec4 " + ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
143                + "attribute vec4 " + ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
144                + "attribute vec2 " + ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0;\n" //
145                + "attribute vec4 " + TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
146                + "uniform mat4 u_projTrans;\n" //
147                + "varying vec4 v_color;\n" //
148                + "varying vec4 v_tweak;\n" //
149                + "varying vec2 v_texCoords;\n" //
150                + "varying float v_lightFix;\n" //
151                + "\n" //
152                + "void main()\n" //
153                + "{\n" //
154                + "   v_color = " + ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
155                + "   v_color.a = v_color.a * (255.0/254.0);\n" //
156                + "   v_tweak = " + TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
157                + "   v_tweak.a = pow(v_tweak.a * (255.0/254.0) + 0.5, 1.709);\n" //
158                + "   v_lightFix = 1.0 + pow(v_tweak.a, 1.41421356);\n" //
159                + "   v_texCoords = " + ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0;\n" //
160                + "   gl_Position =  u_projTrans * " + ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
161                + "}\n";
162        String fragmentShader =
163                "#ifdef GL_ES\n" +
164                        "#define LOWP lowp\n" +
165                        "precision mediump float;\n" +
166                        "#else\n" +
167                        "#define LOWP \n" +
168                        "#endif\n" +
169                        "varying vec2 v_texCoords;\n" +
170                        "varying LOWP vec4 v_color;\n" +
171                        "varying LOWP vec4 v_tweak;\n" +
172                        "varying float v_lightFix;\n" +
173                        "uniform sampler2D u_texture;\n" +
174                        "const vec3 bright = vec3(0.375, 0.5, 0.125);\n" +
175                        "void main()\n" +
176                        "{\n" +
177                        "   vec4 tgt = texture2D( u_texture, v_texCoords );\n" +
178                        "   vec3 ycc = vec3(\n" +
179                        "     (v_color.r - 0.5 + v_tweak.r * pow(dot(tgt.rgb, bright), v_tweak.a) * v_lightFix),\n" + // luma
180                        "     (v_color.g - 0.5 + (tgt.r - tgt.b) * v_tweak.g) * 2.0,\n" + // warmth
181                        "     (v_color.b - 0.5 + (tgt.g - tgt.b) * v_tweak.b) * 2.0);\n" + // mildness
182                        "   gl_FragColor = vec4( (clamp(mat3(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.625, -0.375, -0.375, -0.5, 0.5, -0.5) * ycc, 0.0, 1.0)), v_color.a * tgt.a);\n" +
183                        "}";
184
185
186        ShaderProgram shader = new ShaderProgram(vertexShader, fragmentShader);
187        if (!shader.isCompiled()) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Error compiling shader: " + shader.getLog());
188        return shader;
189    }
190
191    @Override
192    public void begin () {
193        if (drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.end must be called before begin.");
194        renderCalls = 0;
195
196        Gdx.gl.glDepthMask(false);
197        if (customShader != null)
198            customShader.bind();
199        else
200            shader.bind();
201        setupMatrices();
202
203        drawing = true;
204    }
205
206    @Override
207    public void end () {
208        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before end.");
209        if (idx > 0) flush();
210        lastTexture = null;
211        drawing = false;
212
213        GL20 gl = Gdx.gl;
214        gl.glDepthMask(true);
215        if (isBlendingEnabled()) gl.glDisable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
216    }
217
218    @Override
219    public void setColor (Color tint) {
220        color = tint.toFloatBits();
221    }
222
223    /**
224     * Sets the additive changes to the YCwCm color, as well as the multiplicative change to the alpha.
225     * @param lumaAdd additive luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
226     * @param warmAdd additive chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
227     * @param mildAdd additive chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
228     * @param alphaMul multiplicative alpha channel, from 0 to 1; 1.0 is neutral
229     */
230    @Override
231    public void setColor (float lumaAdd, float warmAdd, float mildAdd, float alphaMul) {
232        color = ColorTools.ycwcm(lumaAdd, warmAdd, mildAdd, alphaMul);
233    }
234
235    public void setColor (final float color) {
236        setPackedColor(color);
237    }
238
239    public void setIntColor(final int color) {
240        this.color = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat(Integer.reverseBytes(color & -2));
241    }
242
243    public void setIntColor(int luma, int warm, int mild, int alpha) {
244        color = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat((alpha << 24 & 0xFE000000)
245                | (mild << 16 & 0xFF0000) | (warm << 8 & 0xFF00) | (luma & 0xFF));
246    }
247
248    @Override
249    public void setPackedColor (final float color) {
250        this.color = color;
251    }
252
253    @Override
254    public Color getColor () {
255        final int intBits = NumberUtils.floatToRawIntBits(color);
256        Color color = tempColor;
257        color.r = (intBits & 0xff) / 255f;
258        color.g = ((intBits >>> 8) & 0xff) / 255f;
259        color.b = ((intBits >>> 16) & 0xff) / 255f;
260        color.a = ((intBits >>> 24) & 0xff) / 255f;
261        return color;
262    }
263
264    @Override
265    public float getPackedColor () {
266        return color;
267    }
268
269    /**
270     * Sets the multiplicative changes to the YCwCm color, along with the contrast.
271     * @param lumaMul multiplicative luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
272     * @param warmMul multiplicative chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
273     * @param mildMul multiplicative chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
274     * @param contrast affects how lightness changes, from 0 (low contrast, cloudy look) to 1 (high contrast, sharpened look); 0.5 is neutral
275     */
276    public void setTweak (float lumaMul, float warmMul, float mildMul, float contrast) {
277        tweak = ColorTools.ycwcm(lumaMul, warmMul, mildMul, contrast);
278    }
279
280    /**
281     * Sets the tweak using a single packed YCwCm float.
282     * @see #setTweak(float, float, float, float)
283     * @param tweak a packed YCwCm float, with contrast instead of alpha
284     */
285    public void setTweak (final float tweak) {
286        this.tweak = tweak;
287    }
288    
289    public float getTweak () {
290        return tweak;
291    }
292    
293    public void setIntTweak(final int tweak) {
294        this.tweak = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat(Integer.reverseBytes(tweak & -2));
295    }
296
297    public void setIntTweak(int luma, int warm, int mild, int contrast) {
298        tweak = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat((contrast << 24 & 0xFE000000)
299                | (mild << 16 & 0xFF0000) | (warm << 8 & 0xFF00) | (luma & 0xFF));
300    }
301    /**
302     * A convenience method that sets both the color (with {@link #setColor(float)}) and the tweak (with
303     * {@link #setTweak(float)}) at the same time.
304     * @param color the additive components and alpha, as a packed float
305     * @param tweak the multiplicative components and contrast, as a packed float
306     */
307    public void setTweakedColor(final float color, final float tweak) {
308        setColor(color);
309        setTweak(tweak);
310    }
311    /**
312     * A convenience method that sets both the color (with {@link #setColor(float, float, float, float)}) and the tweak
313     * (with {@link #setTweak(float, float, float, float)}) at the same time.
314     * @param lumaAdd additive luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
315     * @param warmAdd additive chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
316     * @param mildAdd additive chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
317     * @param alphaMul multiplicative alpha channel, from 0 to 1; 1.0 is neutral
318     * @param lumaMul multiplicative luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
319     * @param warmMul multiplicative chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
320     * @param mildMul multiplicative chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
321     * @param contrast affects how lightness changes, from 0 (low contrast, cloudy look) to 1 (high contrast, sharpened look); 0.5 is neutral
322     */
323    public void setTweakedColor (final float lumaAdd, final float warmAdd,
324                                 final float mildAdd, final float alphaMul,
325                                 final float lumaMul, final float warmMul,
326                                 final float mildMul, final float contrast) {
327        setColor(lumaAdd, warmAdd, mildAdd, alphaMul);
328        setTweak(lumaMul, warmMul, mildMul, contrast);
329    }
330
331    @Override
332    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height, float scaleX,
333                      float scaleY, float rotation, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight, boolean flipX, boolean flipY) {
334        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
335
336        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
337
338        if (texture != lastTexture)
339            switchTexture(texture);
340        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
341            flush();
342
343        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
344        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
345        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
346        float fx = -originX;
347        float fy = -originY;
348        float fx2 = width - originX;
349        float fy2 = height - originY;
350
351        // scale
352        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
353            fx *= scaleX;
354            fy *= scaleY;
355            fx2 *= scaleX;
356            fy2 *= scaleY;
357        }
358
359        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
360        final float p1x = fx;
361        final float p1y = fy;
362        final float p2x = fx;
363        final float p2y = fy2;
364        final float p3x = fx2;
365        final float p3y = fy2;
366        final float p4x = fx2;
367        final float p4y = fy;
368
369        float x1;
370        float y1;
371        float x2;
372        float y2;
373        float x3;
374        float y3;
375        float x4;
376        float y4;
377
378        // rotate
379        if (rotation != 0) {
380            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
381            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
382
383            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
384            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
385
386            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
387            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
388
389            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
390            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
391
392            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
393            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
394        } else {
395            x1 = p1x;
396            y1 = p1y;
397
398            x2 = p2x;
399            y2 = p2y;
400
401            x3 = p3x;
402            y3 = p3y;
403
404            x4 = p4x;
405            y4 = p4y;
406        }
407
408        x1 += worldOriginX;
409        y1 += worldOriginY;
410        x2 += worldOriginX;
411        y2 += worldOriginY;
412        x3 += worldOriginX;
413        y3 += worldOriginY;
414        x4 += worldOriginX;
415        y4 += worldOriginY;
416
417        float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
418        float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
419        float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
420        float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
421
422        if (flipX) {
423            float tmp = u;
424            u = u2;
425            u2 = tmp;
426        }
427
428        if (flipY) {
429            float tmp = v;
430            v = v2;
431            v2 = tmp;
432        }
433
434        final float color = this.color;
435        final float tweak = this.tweak;
436        final int idx = this.idx;
437        vertices[idx] = x1;
438        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
439        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
440        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
441        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
442        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
443
444        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
445        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
446        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
447        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
448        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
449        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
450
451        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
452        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
453        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
454        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
455        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
456        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
457
458        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
459        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
460        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
461        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
462        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
463        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
464        this.idx = idx + 24;
465    }
466
467    @Override
468    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth,
469                      int srcHeight, boolean flipX, boolean flipY) {
470        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
471
472        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
473
474        if (texture != lastTexture)
475            switchTexture(texture);
476        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
477            flush();
478
479        float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
480        float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
481        float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
482        float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
483        final float fx2 = x + width;
484        final float fy2 = y + height;
485
486        if (flipX) {
487            float tmp = u;
488            u = u2;
489            u2 = tmp;
490        }
491
492        if (flipY) {
493            float tmp = v;
494            v = v2;
495            v2 = tmp;
496        }
497
498        final float color = this.color;
499        final float tweak = this.tweak;
500        final int idx = this.idx;
501        vertices[idx] = x;
502        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
503        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
504        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
505        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
506        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
507
508        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
509        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
510        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
511        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
512        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
513        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
514
515        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
516        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
517        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
518        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
519        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
520        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
521
522        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
523        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
524        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
525        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
526        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
527        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
528        this.idx = idx + 24;
529    }
530
531    @Override
532    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight) {
533        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
534
535        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
536
537        if (texture != lastTexture)
538            switchTexture(texture);
539        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
540            flush();
541
542        final float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
543        final float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
544        final float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
545        final float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
546        final float fx2 = x + srcWidth;
547        final float fy2 = y + srcHeight;
548
549        final float color = this.color;
550        final float tweak = this.tweak;
551        final int idx = this.idx;
552        vertices[idx] = x;
553        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
554        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
555        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
556        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
557        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
558
559        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
560        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
561        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
562        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
563        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
564        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
565
566        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
567        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
568        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
569        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
570        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
571        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
572
573        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
574        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
575        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
576        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
577        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
578        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
579        this.idx = idx + 24;
580    }
581
582    @Override
583    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height, float u, float v, float u2, float v2) {
584        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
585
586        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
587
588        if (texture != lastTexture)
589            switchTexture(texture);
590        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
591            flush();
592
593        final float fx2 = x + width;
594        final float fy2 = y + height;
595
596        final float color = this.color;
597        final float tweak = this.tweak;
598        final int idx = this.idx;
599        vertices[idx] = x;
600        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
601        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
602        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
603        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
604        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
605
606        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
607        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
608        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
609        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
610        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
611        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
612
613        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
614        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
615        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
616        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
617        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
618        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
619
620        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
621        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
622        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
623        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
624        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
625        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
626        this.idx = idx + 24;
627    }
628
629    @Override
630    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y) {
631        draw(texture, x, y, texture.getWidth(), texture.getHeight());
632    }
633
634    @Override
635    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height) {
636        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
637
638        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
639
640        if (texture != lastTexture)
641            switchTexture(texture);
642        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
643            flush();
644
645        final float fx2 = x + width;
646        final float fy2 = y + height;
647        final float u = 0;
648        final float v = 1;
649        final float u2 = 1;
650        final float v2 = 0;
651
652        final float color = this.color;
653        final float tweak = this.tweak;
654        final int idx = this.idx;
655        vertices[idx] = x;
656        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
657        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
658        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
659        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
660        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
661
662        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
663        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
664        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
665        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
666        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
667        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
668
669        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
670        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
671        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
672        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
673        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
674        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
675
676        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
677        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
678        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
679        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
680        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
681        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
682        this.idx = idx + 24;
683    }
684
685    /**
686     * This is very different from the other overloads in this class; it assumes the float array it is given is in the
687     * format libGDX uses to give to SpriteBatch, that is, in groups of 20 floats per sprite. ColorfulBatch uses 24
688     * floats per sprite, to add tweak per color, so this does some conversion.
689     * @param texture the Texture being drawn from; usually an atlas or some parent Texture with lots of TextureRegions
690     * @param spriteVertices not the same format as {@link #vertices} in this class; should have a length that's a multiple of 20
691     * @param offset where to start drawing vertices from {@code spriteVertices}
692     * @param count how many vertices to draw from {@code spriteVertices} (20 vertices is one sprite)
693     */
694    @Override
695    public void draw (Texture texture, float[] spriteVertices, int offset, int count) {
696        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
697
698        count = (count / 5) * 6;
699        int verticesLength = vertices.length;
700        int remainingVertices = verticesLength;
701        if (texture != lastTexture)
702            switchTexture(texture);
703        else {
704            remainingVertices -= idx;
705            if (remainingVertices == 0) {
706                flush();
707                remainingVertices = verticesLength;
708            }
709        }
710        int copyCount = Math.min(remainingVertices, count);
711        final float tweak = this.tweak;
712
713        ////old way, breaks when libGDX code expects SPRITE_SIZE to be 20
714        //System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, idx, copyCount);
715        ////new way, thanks mgsx
716        for (int s = offset, v = idx, i = 0; i < copyCount; i += 6) {
717            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
718            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
719            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
720            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
721            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
722            vertices[v++] = tweak;
723        }
724        idx += copyCount;
725        count -= copyCount;
726        while (count > 0) {
727            offset += (copyCount / 6) * 5;
728            flush();
729            copyCount = Math.min(verticesLength, count);
730            ////old way, breaks when libGDX code expects SPRITE_SIZE to be 20
731            //System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, 0, copyCount);
732            ////new way, thanks mgsx
733            for (int s = offset, v = 0, i = 0; i < copyCount; i += 6) {
734                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
735                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
736                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
737                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
738                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
739                vertices[v++] = tweak;
740            }
741            idx += copyCount;
742            count -= copyCount;
743        }
744    }
745
746    /**
747     * Meant for code that uses ColorfulBatch specifically and can set an extra float (for the color tweak) per vertex,
748     * this is just like {@link #draw(Texture, float[], int, int)} when used in other Batch implementations, but expects
749     * {@code spriteVertices} to have a length that is a multiple of 24 instead of 20.
750     * @param texture the Texture being drawn from; usually an atlas or some parent Texture with lots of TextureRegions
751     * @param spriteVertices vertices formatted as this class uses them; length should be a multiple of 24
752     * @param offset where to start drawing vertices from {@code spriteVertices}
753     * @param count how many vertices to draw from {@code spriteVertices} (24 vertices is one sprite)
754     */
755    public void drawExactly (Texture texture, float[] spriteVertices, int offset, int count) {
756        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
757
758        int verticesLength = vertices.length;
759        int remainingVertices = verticesLength;
760        if (texture != lastTexture)
761            switchTexture(texture);
762        else {
763            remainingVertices -= idx;
764            if (remainingVertices == 0) {
765                flush();
766                remainingVertices = verticesLength;
767            }
768        }
769        int copyCount = Math.min(remainingVertices, count);
770
771        System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, idx, copyCount);
772        idx += copyCount;
773        count -= copyCount;
774        while (count > 0) {
775            offset += copyCount;
776            flush();
777            copyCount = Math.min(verticesLength, count);
778            System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, 0, copyCount);
779            idx += copyCount;
780            count -= copyCount;
781        }
782    }
783
784    @Override
785    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y) {
786        draw(region, x, y, region.getRegionWidth(), region.getRegionHeight());
787    }
788
789    @Override
790    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float width, float height) {
791        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
792
793        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
794
795        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
796        if (texture != lastTexture) {
797            switchTexture(texture);
798        } else if (idx == vertices.length) {
799            flush();
800        }
801        final float fx2 = x + width;
802        final float fy2 = y + height;
803        final float u = region.getU();
804        final float v = region.getV2();
805        final float u2 = region.getU2();
806        final float v2 = region.getV();
807
808        final float color = this.color;
809        final float tweak = this.tweak;
810        final int idx = this.idx;
811        vertices[idx] = x;
812        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
813        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
814        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
815        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
816        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
817
818        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
819        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
820        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
821        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
822        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
823        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
824
825        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
826        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
827        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
828        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
829        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
830        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
831
832        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
833        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
834        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
835        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
836        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
837        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
838        this.idx = idx + 24;
839    }
840
841    @Override
842    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height,
843                      float scaleX, float scaleY, float rotation) {
844        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
845
846        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
847
848        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
849        if (texture != lastTexture) {
850            switchTexture(texture);
851        } else if (idx == vertices.length) //
852            flush();
853
854        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
855        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
856        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
857        float fx = -originX;
858        float fy = -originY;
859        float fx2 = width - originX;
860        float fy2 = height - originY;
861
862        // scale
863        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
864            fx *= scaleX;
865            fy *= scaleY;
866            fx2 *= scaleX;
867            fy2 *= scaleY;
868        }
869
870        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
871        final float p1x = fx;
872        final float p1y = fy;
873        final float p2x = fx;
874        final float p2y = fy2;
875        final float p3x = fx2;
876        final float p3y = fy2;
877        final float p4x = fx2;
878        final float p4y = fy;
879
880        float x1;
881        float y1;
882        float x2;
883        float y2;
884        float x3;
885        float y3;
886        float x4;
887        float y4;
888
889        // rotate
890        if (rotation != 0) {
891            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
892            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
893
894            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
895            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
896
897            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
898            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
899
900            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
901            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
902
903            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
904            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
905        } else {
906            x1 = p1x;
907            y1 = p1y;
908
909            x2 = p2x;
910            y2 = p2y;
911
912            x3 = p3x;
913            y3 = p3y;
914
915            x4 = p4x;
916            y4 = p4y;
917        }
918
919        x1 += worldOriginX;
920        y1 += worldOriginY;
921        x2 += worldOriginX;
922        y2 += worldOriginY;
923        x3 += worldOriginX;
924        y3 += worldOriginY;
925        x4 += worldOriginX;
926        y4 += worldOriginY;
927
928        final float u = region.getU();
929        final float v = region.getV2();
930        final float u2 = region.getU2();
931        final float v2 = region.getV();
932
933        final float color = this.color;
934        final float tweak = this.tweak;
935        final int idx = this.idx;
936        vertices[idx] = x1;
937        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
938        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
939        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
940        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
941        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
942
943        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
944        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
945        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
946        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
947        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
948        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
949
950        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
951        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
952        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
953        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
954        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
955        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
956
957        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
958        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
959        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
960        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
961        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
962        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
963        this.idx = idx + 24;
964    }
965
966    @Override
967    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height,
968                      float scaleX, float scaleY, float rotation, boolean clockwise) {
969        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
970
971        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
972
973        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
974        if (texture != lastTexture) {
975            switchTexture(texture);
976        } else if (idx == vertices.length) //
977            flush();
978
979        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
980        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
981        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
982        float fx = -originX;
983        float fy = -originY;
984        float fx2 = width - originX;
985        float fy2 = height - originY;
986
987        // scale
988        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
989            fx *= scaleX;
990            fy *= scaleY;
991            fx2 *= scaleX;
992            fy2 *= scaleY;
993        }
994
995        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
996        final float p1x = fx;
997        final float p1y = fy;
998        final float p2x = fx;
999        final float p2y = fy2;
1000        final float p3x = fx2;
1001        final float p3y = fy2;
1002        final float p4x = fx2;
1003        final float p4y = fy;
1004
1005        float x1;
1006        float y1;
1007        float x2;
1008        float y2;
1009        float x3;
1010        float y3;
1011        float x4;
1012        float y4;
1013
1014        // rotate
1015        if (rotation != 0) {
1016            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
1017            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
1018
1019            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
1020            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
1021
1022            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
1023            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
1024
1025            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
1026            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
1027
1028            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
1029            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
1030        } else {
1031            x1 = p1x;
1032            y1 = p1y;
1033
1034            x2 = p2x;
1035            y2 = p2y;
1036
1037            x3 = p3x;
1038            y3 = p3y;
1039
1040            x4 = p4x;
1041            y4 = p4y;
1042        }
1043
1044        x1 += worldOriginX;
1045        y1 += worldOriginY;
1046        x2 += worldOriginX;
1047        y2 += worldOriginY;
1048        x3 += worldOriginX;
1049        y3 += worldOriginY;
1050        x4 += worldOriginX;
1051        y4 += worldOriginY;
1052
1053        float u1, v1, u2, v2, u3, v3, u4, v4;
1054        if (clockwise) {
1055            u1 = region.getU2();
1056            v1 = region.getV2();
1057            u2 = region.getU();
1058            v2 = region.getV2();
1059            u3 = region.getU();
1060            v3 = region.getV();
1061            u4 = region.getU2();
1062            v4 = region.getV();
1063        } else {
1064            u1 = region.getU();
1065            v1 = region.getV();
1066            u2 = region.getU2();
1067            v2 = region.getV();
1068            u3 = region.getU2();
1069            v3 = region.getV2();
1070            u4 = region.getU();
1071            v4 = region.getV2();
1072        }
1073
1074        final float color = this.color;
1075        final float tweak = this.tweak;
1076        final int idx = this.idx;
1077        vertices[idx] = x1;
1078        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
1079        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
1080        vertices[idx + 3] = u1;
1081        vertices[idx + 4] = v1;
1082        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
1083
1084        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
1085        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
1086        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
1087        vertices[idx + 9] = u2;
1088        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
1089        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
1090
1091        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
1092        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
1093        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
1094        vertices[idx + 15] = u3;
1095        vertices[idx + 16] = v3;
1096        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
1097
1098        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
1099        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
1100        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
1101        vertices[idx + 21] = u4;
1102        vertices[idx + 22] = v4;
1103        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
1104        this.idx = idx + 24;
1105    }
1106
1107    @Override
1108    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float width, float height, Affine2 transform) {
1109        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
1110
1111        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
1112
1113        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
1114        if (texture != lastTexture) {
1115            switchTexture(texture);
1116        } else if (idx == vertices.length) {
1117            flush();
1118        }
1119
1120        // construct corner points
1121        float x1 = transform.m02;
1122        float y1 = transform.m12;
1123        float x2 = transform.m01 * height + transform.m02;
1124        float y2 = transform.m11 * height + transform.m12;
1125        float x3 = transform.m00 * width + transform.m01 * height + transform.m02;
1126        float y3 = transform.m10 * width + transform.m11 * height + transform.m12;
1127        float x4 = transform.m00 * width + transform.m02;
1128        float y4 = transform.m10 * width + transform.m12;
1129
1130        float u = region.getU();
1131        float v = region.getV2();
1132        float u2 = region.getV2();
1133        float v2 = region.getV();
1134
1135        final float color = this.color;
1136        final float tweak = this.tweak;
1137        final int idx = this.idx;
1138        vertices[idx] = x1;
1139        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
1140        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
1141        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
1142        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
1143        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
1144
1145        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
1146        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
1147        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
1148        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
1149        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
1150        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
1151
1152        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
1153        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
1154        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
1155        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
1156        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
1157        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
1158
1159        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
1160        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
1161        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
1162        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
1163        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
1164        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
1165        this.idx = idx + 24;
1166    }
1167
1168    @SuppressWarnings("RedundantCast") // These casts are absolutely not redundant! Java 9 changed Buffer ABI.
1169    @Override
1170    public void flush () {
1171        if (idx == 0) return;
1172
1173        renderCalls++;
1174        totalRenderCalls++;
1175        int spritesInBatch = idx / SPRITE_SIZE;
1176        if (spritesInBatch > maxSpritesInBatch) maxSpritesInBatch = spritesInBatch;
1177        int count = spritesInBatch * 6;
1178
1179        lastTexture.bind();
1180        Mesh mesh = this.mesh;
1181        mesh.setVertices(vertices, 0, idx);
1182        ((Buffer)mesh.getIndicesBuffer()).position(0);
1183        ((Buffer)mesh.getIndicesBuffer()).limit(count);
1184
1185        if (blendingDisabled) {
1186            Gdx.gl.glDisable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
1187        } else {
1188            Gdx.gl.glEnable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
1189            if (blendSrcFunc != -1) Gdx.gl.glBlendFuncSeparate(blendSrcFunc, blendDstFunc, blendSrcFuncAlpha, blendDstFuncAlpha);
1190        }
1191
1192        mesh.render(customShader != null ? customShader : shader, GL20.GL_TRIANGLES, 0, count);
1193
1194        idx = 0;
1195    }
1196
1197    @Override
1198    public void disableBlending () {
1199        if (blendingDisabled) return;
1200        flush();
1201        blendingDisabled = true;
1202    }
1203
1204    @Override
1205    public void enableBlending () {
1206        if (!blendingDisabled) return;
1207        flush();
1208        blendingDisabled = false;
1209    }
1210
1211    @Override
1212    public void setBlendFunction (int srcFunc, int dstFunc) {
1213        setBlendFunctionSeparate(srcFunc, dstFunc, srcFunc, dstFunc);
1214    }
1215
1216    @Override
1217    public void setBlendFunctionSeparate(int srcFuncColor, int dstFuncColor, int srcFuncAlpha, int dstFuncAlpha) {
1218        if (blendSrcFunc == srcFuncColor && blendDstFunc == dstFuncColor && blendSrcFuncAlpha == srcFuncAlpha && blendDstFuncAlpha == dstFuncAlpha) return;
1219        flush();
1220        blendSrcFunc = srcFuncColor;
1221        blendDstFunc = dstFuncColor;
1222        blendSrcFuncAlpha = srcFuncAlpha;
1223        blendDstFuncAlpha = dstFuncAlpha;
1224    }
1225
1226    @Override
1227    public int getBlendSrcFunc () {
1228        return blendSrcFunc;
1229    }
1230
1231    @Override
1232    public int getBlendDstFunc () {
1233        return blendDstFunc;
1234    }
1235
1236    @Override
1237    public int getBlendSrcFuncAlpha() {
1238        return blendSrcFuncAlpha;
1239    }
1240
1241    @Override
1242    public int getBlendDstFuncAlpha() {
1243        return blendDstFuncAlpha;
1244    }
1245
1246    @Override
1247    public void dispose () {
1248        mesh.dispose();
1249        if (ownsShader && shader != null) shader.dispose();
1250    }
1251
1252    @Override
1253    public Matrix4 getProjectionMatrix () {
1254        return projectionMatrix;
1255    }
1256
1257    @Override
1258    public Matrix4 getTransformMatrix () {
1259        return transformMatrix;
1260    }
1261
1262    @Override
1263    public void setProjectionMatrix (Matrix4 projection) {
1264        if (drawing) flush();
1265        projectionMatrix.set(projection);
1266        if (drawing) setupMatrices();
1267    }
1268
1269    @Override
1270    public void setTransformMatrix (Matrix4 transform) {
1271        if (drawing) flush();
1272        transformMatrix.set(transform);
1273        if (drawing) setupMatrices();
1274    }
1275
1276    protected void setupMatrices () {
1277        combinedMatrix.set(projectionMatrix).mul(transformMatrix);
1278        if (customShader != null) {
1279            customShader.setUniformMatrix("u_projTrans", combinedMatrix);
1280            customShader.setUniformi("u_texture", 0);
1281        } else {
1282            shader.setUniformMatrix("u_projTrans", combinedMatrix);
1283            shader.setUniformi("u_texture", 0);
1284        }
1285    }
1286
1287    protected void switchTexture (Texture texture) {
1288        flush();
1289        lastTexture = texture;
1290        invTexWidth = 1.0f / texture.getWidth();
1291        invTexHeight = 1.0f / texture.getHeight();
1292    }
1293
1294    @Override
1295    public void setShader (ShaderProgram shader) {
1296        if (drawing) {
1297            flush();
1298        }
1299        customShader = shader;
1300        if (drawing) {
1301            if (customShader != null)
1302                customShader.bind();
1303            else
1304                this.shader.bind();
1305            setupMatrices();
1306        }
1307    }
1308
1309    @Override
1310    public ShaderProgram getShader () {
1311        if (customShader == null) {
1312            return shader;
1313        }
1314        return customShader;
1315    }
1316
1317    @Override
1318    public boolean isBlendingEnabled () {
1319        return !blendingDisabled;
1320    }
1321
1322    public boolean isDrawing () {
1323        return drawing;
1324    }
1325    static public final int X1 = 0;
1326    static public final int Y1 = 1;
1327    static public final int C1 = 2;
1328    static public final int U1 = 3;
1329    static public final int V1 = 4;
1330    static public final int T1 = 5;
1331    static public final int X2 = 6;
1332    static public final int Y2 = 7;
1333    static public final int C2 = 8;
1334    static public final int U2 = 9;
1335    static public final int V2 = 10;
1336    static public final int T2 = 11;
1337    static public final int X3 = 12;
1338    static public final int Y3 = 13;
1339    static public final int C3 = 14;
1340    static public final int U3 = 15;
1341    static public final int V3 = 16;
1342    static public final int T3 = 17;
1343    static public final int X4 = 18;
1344    static public final int Y4 = 19;
1345    static public final int C4 = 20;
1346    static public final int U4 = 21;
1347    static public final int V4 = 22;
1348    static public final int T4 = 23;
1349}
